comment: Smart Data Models - GovHydro3 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/GovHydro3/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE Hydro Governor-Turbine Model.  This model differs from that defined in the IEEE modeling guideline paper in that the limits on gate position and velocity do not permit wind up of the upstream signals.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: at
contents.comment: Turbine gain (At).  Typical Value = 1.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: db1
contents.comment: Intentional dead-band width (db1).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: db2
contents.comment: Unintentional dead-band (db2).  Unit = MW.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: dturb
contents.comment: Turbine damping factor (Dturb).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: eps
contents.comment: Intentional db hysteresis (eps).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: governorControl
contents.comment: Governor control flag (Cflag). true = PID control is active false = double derivative control is active. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: gv1
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 1, PU gv (Gv1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv2
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 2, PU gv (Gv2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv3
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 3, PU gv (Gv3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv4
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 4, PU gv (Gv4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv5
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 5, PU gv (Gv5).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv6
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 6, PU gv (Gv6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: h0
contents.comment: Turbine nominal head (H0).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k1
contents.comment: Derivative gain (K1).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k2
contents.comment: Double derivative gain, if Cflag = -1 (K2).  Typical Value = 2.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kg
contents.comment: Gate servo gain (Kg).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ki
contents.comment: Integral gain (Ki).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mwbase
contents.comment: Base for power values (MWbase) (> 0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pgv1
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 1, PU power (Pgv1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv2
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 2, PU power (Pgv2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv3
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 3, PU power (Pgv3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv4
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 4, PU power (Pgv4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv5
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 5, PU power (Pgv5).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv6
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 6, PU power (Pgv6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmax
contents.comment: Maximum gate opening, PU of MWbase (Pmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmin
contents.comment: Minimum gate opening, PU of MWbase (Pmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: qnl
contents.comment: No-load turbine flow at nominal head (Qnl).  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0.0

contents.name: relec
contents.comment: Steady-state droop, PU, for electrical power feedback (Relec).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rgate
contents.comment: Steady-state droop, PU, for governor output feedback (Rgate).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: td
contents.comment: Input filter time constant (Td).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

contents.name: tf
contents.comment: Washout time constant (Tf).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: tp
contents.comment: Gate servo time constant (Tp).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

contents.name: tt
contents.comment: Power feedback time constant (Tt).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0

contents.name: tw
contents.comment: Water inertia time constant (Tw).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: velcl
contents.comment: Maximum gate closing velocity (Velcl).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = -0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: velop
contents.comment: Maximum gate opening velocity (Velop).  Unit = PU/sec. Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
